title: Verify All available Settings options are visible and accessible in the sub-menu display (subscriber NOT signed in)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the app has been accessed
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on the default view/Home screen
AND we open Settings Menu by pressing (Y) controller button
custom_expected:
THEN the Settings menu will open
AND the following Setting menu options will display: 

-How to Purchase NHL.tv
-Favorite Teams
-Hide Scores: On/Off
-Play Live Game from: Start/Live
-About
-Log In

AND each will display their appropriate content when selected

title: Verify All available Settings options are visible and accessible in the sub-menu display (subscriber signed in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been accessed
AND a subscriber account has been signed in
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on the default view/Home screen
AND we open Settings Menu by pressing (Y) controller button
custom_expected:
THEN the Settings menu will open
AND the following Setting menu options will display: 

-Favorite Teams
-Hide Scores: On/Off
-Play Live Game from: Start/Live
-About
-Log Out
<user account name displays>


AND each will display their appropriate content when selected
